tooltip.medium_item08.desc: Unknown seasoning that adds a unique flavor to food when sprinkled with a few grains
tooltip.medium_item35.desc: As long as you wear this, you'll be immune to all poisons and have a strong body this year!
tooltip.medium_item35_1.desc: +5 armor, creepers and spiders will stay away from you
tooltip.medium_item68.desc: Stored in the cabinet for a year, garlic? It looks tasty
tooltip.medium_item165.desc: Flames continue to flicker in a windless enclosed room, and at night the fiery red flames turn into a deep blue
tooltip.medium_item165_1.desc: Immunity to darkness and blindness; takes damage during the day
tooltip.medium_item258.desc: Allows the user to control their body's movement for a certain period of time after touching the item
tooltip.medium_item480.desc: According to the user's description, the coin was found with half a tooth embedded in it
tooltip.medium_item666.desc: A pair of used goggles that grants the user exceptional water affinity and swimming skills
tooltip.medium_item666_1.desc: 50% increase in swimming speed, 50% reduction in oxygen consumption
tooltip.medium_item689.desc: Absorbs all nearby thermal energy sources, even if the user is in magma, it looks delicious
